help_msg:
Developed by @endogen for [Stellite](https://stellite.cash)

ðŸ”¹ *Available commands (any user):*

`/price` - Shows the current [TradeOgre](https://tradeogre.com) price for XTL

`/wiki <search-term>` - Shows information about the given topic. 
List all available search-terms by not entering a search-term.

`/feedback <text>` - Send us some feedback about the bot

ðŸ”¹ *Available commands (administrator):*

`/ban` - Ban a user by replaying to his message with this command

`/delete` - Remove a message by replaying to it with this command

`/version` - Check if new version of bot is available

`/update` - Update bot to newest version on GitHub

`/restart` - Restart bot and reload configuration

`/shutdown` - Shut the bot down

This bot is open source and you can download it on 
[GitHub](https://github.com/Endogen/StelliteBot)
